workflow.title: Finding wrong links in Linked Open Data with RapidMiner
workflow.description: This simple workflow shows how to detect wrong links in Linked Open Data. It uses operators from the Linked Open Data and the Anomaly Detection extensions.The process first reads a list of links from the EventMedia endpoint, linking to DBpedia, then creates feature vectors for each of those links. Finally, an outlier detection operator is employed to find suspicious links.
